scripts.test-server:watch: PORT=1027 TZ=UTC NODE_ENV=testing tsx watch server/src/server.ts
scripts.test-server:watch:debug: TZ=UTC DEBUG=1 NODE_ENV=testing tsx watch server/src/server.ts
scripts.test-server:assistant: PORT=1037 TZ=UTC NODE_ENV=testing nohup node built/server/src/server.js 2>&1 | cat -v > test-server.log &
scripts.test-server:assistant:debug: PORT=1037 TZ=UTC DEBUG=1 NODE_ENV=testing nohup node built/server/src/server.js 2>&1 | cat -v > test-server-debug.log &
scripts.test-server:watch:assistant: PORT=1037 TZ=UTC NODE_ENV=testing tsx watch server/src/server.ts 2>&1 | cat -v > test-server-watch.log &
scripts.test-server:watch:debug:assistant: PORT=1037 TZ=UTC DEBUG=1 NODE_ENV=testing tsx watch server/src/server.ts > test-server-watch-debug.log 2>&1 &
scripts.tests: TZ=UTC NODE_ENV=testing SERVER=localhost:1027 mocha server/src/tests --config server/src/tests/.mocharc.json
scripts.tests:debug: TZ=UTC NODE_ENV=testing DEBUG=1 mocha server/src/tests --config server/src/tests/.mocharc.json
scripts.tests:assistant: TZ=UTC SERVER=localhost:1037 NODE_ENV=testing mocha server/src/tests --config server/src/tests/.mocharc.json
scripts.tests:assistant:debug: TZ=UTC SERVER=localhost:1037 NODE_ENV=testing DEBUG=1 mocha server/src/tests --config server/src/tests/.mocharc.json
scripts.dev:debug: TZ=UTC DEBUG=1 NODE_ENV=development tsx watch server/src/server.ts
